df.loc[(df.Frequency == '\xa0yr'), 'Frequency'] = 'Yearly'

source.dc69d6d0:
# changing monthly salary to  average annual pay by multiplying by 12

mask = df.Frequency == 'monthly'
df[mask]['USD_Avg_Pay'] = 12 * df.USD_Avg_Pay
df.drop('Frequency', axis = 1, inplace = True)

df.loc[(df.Job == 'Machine Learning Engineer'),'Job'] = "ML Engineer"
